mapper.update: UPDATE order_shop SET `status` = #{orderStatus},update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE username = #{username} AND order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id orderId,a.sku_name skuName,a.sku_count skuCount,a.sku_price skuStorePrice,b.order_num orderNum FROM order_shop a JOIN order_jd b ON b.order_id=a.order_id WHERE a.belong_station_no=#{stationNo} AND a.username=#{username} AND a.`status`=#{status}
